TF091393-BENIN CATALYTIC FUND PROGRAM PREPARATION,TF091947-BENIN: EDUCATION FOR ALL - FAST
            TRACK INITIATIVE CATALYTIC FUND

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Education for All-Fast Track Initiative Project for Benin is
            to contribute to expanding equitable access to pre-school
            and primary education and to supporting the development of
            literacy programs, while improving quality and retention at
            primary level as well as the management of the sector. The
            project implementation has been refocused on the activities
            which: (i) directly contribute to the achievement of the
            project development objective; (ii) have begun start-up
            activities that make their completion by the new closing
            date realistic; and (iii) require international financial
            support. The activities are newly introduced or modified are
            the following: (i) providing direct support to pre-primary
            and primary public schools for teaching materials and
            operating costs; and (ii) supporting a program of daily
            nutrition assistance in preprimary and primary public
            schools (501 school canteens are concerned) instead of
            building 180 new canteens as originally planned.
